long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compatible with your device
Reminds some js,css and ts syntax
This app is for the  junior programmer, who knows how to work with code but sometimes forgets the syntax.
With this application you can quickly reach the code, copy and receive suitable links for additional help, as well as quickly search Google for the desired value

NEW! - create your Own syntax buttons with any data you want! with complete CRUD
